oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Atlantic Envelope Company, with Mayor Briley, circa 1966 May 12
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nashville Mayor Briley is pictured beside a huge envelope display produced by the Atlantic Envelope Company, a Division of National Service Industries, Inc. The 1967 City Directory cites the business address at 888 Elm Hill Pike, Sigmund Held, General Manager. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negatives : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980; Held, Sigmund
Atlantic Envelope Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
